title: Enter their details
subtitle: If you have a professional representative, you can find their contact details on any letter you’ve received from them.
noDetails: I don’t have their details to hand

error.required: Enter your representative’s name or the organisation they work for

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid title. Check it and enter it again
You have entered an invalid first name. Check it and enter it again
You have entered an invalid surname. Check it and enter it again
You have entered an invalid name. Check it and enter it again

error.required: Enter the first line of your address
error.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Address line 1 and enter it again
You have entered an invalid character. Check your Address line 2 and enter it again

error.required: Enter the town or city from your address
error.invalid: You have entered an invalid character. Check your Town/City and enter it again
You have entered an invalid character. Check your Postcode/ZIP code and enter it again

error.required: Select the country of residence of your representative
error.invalid: The country of residence is invalid

phoneNumber.title: Phone number (optional)
phoneNumber.hint: They will receive SMS updates about your appeal if you enter a mobile phone number

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid phone number. Check it and enter it again

emailAddress.title: Email address (optional)
emailAddress.hint: They will receive email updates about your appeal and a link so they can track your appeal online

error.invalid: You have entered an invalid email address. Check it and enter it again
